title: Product Designer
companyDescription: One of the pioneers of Indonesia online marketplace in the tech realm which has sold many hi-tech gadgets and innovative products since 2016

requirements.requirement: You have excellent knowledge of UX and web design
You know how developer works (additional points)
You have at least 3 years of experience in a similar role

jobDescriptions.jobDescription: Implement and execute user testing and A/B testing
Demonstrate your prototype / design results to user and stakeholder
Formulate good design ideas and propose solutions to increased product usefulness
